title: 03. Usage
text: Invalid username password! Vote Leaderboard User stats FAQ app allows users vote somatic mutations images. Users can log , view images, provide votes comments. app tracks user sessions stores annotations SQLite database. Developed Ivo Christopher Leist application allows users vote genomic mutations based annotations. receive personal link retrieve password. Click link set password use together user name log . can report bugs/issues GitHub repository’s issue tracker. # load package shiny library(ShinyImgVoteR) library(shiny)  Sys.setenv("IMGVOTER_BASE_DIR" = getwd()) config_file_path <- file.path(get_app_dir(), "default_env", "config", "config.yaml") cfg <- load_config(config_file_path)  init_environment(config_file_path)  shiny::addResourcePath(   prefix = "images",   directoryPath = cfg$images_dir )  shiny::addResourcePath(   "www",   system.file("shiny-app","www",package="ShinyImgVoteR") )  message("CONFIG YAML:\t", normalizePath(config_file_path)) message("IMAGES DIR:\t", normalizePath(cfg$images_dir)) message("SQLITE DB:\t", normalizePath(cfg$sqlite_file))  output$cwd <- renderText({   getwd() }) con <- DBI::dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), dbname = cfg$sqlite_file) .exit(DBI::dbDisconnect(con), add = TRUE) makeVotingAppServer(con)

title: ShinyImgVoteR
text: Sophisticated voting system designed collaborative annotation genetic mutations, features tracking user behavior, handling vote changes, maintaining data integrity across multiple users. Voting application allows users vote different B1MG mutations. Users get presented randomly picked image B1MG mutation can vote . FLOW: User logs → triggers mutation loading Mutation image data displayed User makes voting choices → stored TSV file Database updated vote counts Next mutation loaded automatically Process repeats mutations voted
